thread.title: Great hotel in Bercy
thread.title_full: Great hotel in Bercy - Review of Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Paulo R
title: Great hotel in Bercy
text: Bercy is an amazing neighborhood in Paris and Pullman is the most comfortable and elegant hotel you can enjoy in the surroundings of Bercy Village. The rooms are very comfortable and spacious and the convenience of public transportation and Peripherique around the corner. Definitely recommend for a business or leisure stay in Paris
